tspan.tspan: guing for the rights of women.

text.tspan: , or take care of the poor babes whom they bring into the world?
me for endeavouring to persuade them to become more masculine and respectable.
that give a sex to virtue, and confound simple truths with sensual reveries?
fall into their subordinate, yet respectable station in life.
themselves, because intellect will always govern.
: the apartments for wives and concubines in an Ottoman palace
